entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Nain
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:39 AM ADT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snowshower, -13.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Nain Airport 06:00 AM ADT Sunday 19 March 2023
Condition: Light Snowshower
Temperature: -13.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 83 %
Wind Chill: -22
Dewpoint: -15.8°C
Wind: E 17 km/h gust 28 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this morning and early this afternoon. Periods of light snow beginning this afternoon. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High minus 10. Wind chill near minus 21. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:00 AM ADT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 2 cm except 10 cm in the Natuashish area. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 50 gusting to 70 near midnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 06:00 AM ADT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm except 10 cm in the Natuashish area. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 06:00 AM ADT Sunday 19 March 2023
